https://solscan.io/apis.title: Solscan API Plans - Official Pricing
https://solscan.io/apis.info: Comprehensive pricing structure: Free API with 10M C.U/month and 1,000 requests/60s; Pro Level 2: $199/month (150M C.U); Pro Level 3: $399/month (500M C.U); Pro Level 4: $1,099/month (1.5B C.U). Free tier requires attribution.

https://docs.solscan.io/api-access/pro-a.title: Pro API Endpoints Documentation
https://docs.solscan.io/api-access/pro-a.info: Complete list of 20+ Pro API endpoints organized by categories (Account, Token, NFT, Transaction, Block, Monitoring). All endpoints use 100 C.U per request. Migration from V1.0 to V2.0 starting December 1st.

https://docs.solscan.io/api-access/solsc.title: Pro API FAQ
https://docs.solscan.io/api-access/solsc.info: Important limitations: Token price/MarketCap has 3-minute delay; Token list limited to top 2,000 tokens by market cap; No testnet support; No refunds policy; Subscription-based model.

https://pro-api.solscan.io/pro-api-docs/.title: Transaction Detail Endpoint
https://pro-api.solscan.io/pro-api-docs/.info: Complete transaction parsing with SOL/token balance changes, parsed instructions, program details, compute units consumed, priority fees. Returns 401 without Pro API key, 429 for rate limits.

https://solana.com/docs/references/clust.title: Solana Clusters and Public RPC
https://solana.com/docs/references/clust.info: Official Solana public RPC endpoints for mainnet, devnet, and testnet. Free alternatives to commercial APIs for basic blockchain queries and transaction data.

https://www.reddit.com/r/solana/comments.title: Free Solana RPC Alternatives
https://www.reddit.com/r/solana/comments.info: Community recommendations for free RPC providers including dRPC, PublicNode, and other alternatives with high rate limits for developers building without commercial API access.

https://pro-api.solscan.io/pro-api-docs/.title: Token List Endpoint Analysis
https://pro-api.solscan.io/pro-api-docs/.info: Pro API only endpoint supporting 50,000 items per query, 6 pagination options (10-100), 3 sort fields (holder, market_cap, created_time). Requires subscription and returns 401 without authentication.
